original_text: But you have behaved more wickedly than your ancestors. See how all of you are following the stubbornness of your evil hearts instead of obeying me.
korean_text: 너희가 너희 조상들보다 더욱 악을 행하였도다 보라 너희가 각기 악한 마음의 완악함을 따라 행하고 나에게 순종하지 아니하였으므로

sentences.original_text: But you have behaved more wickedly
See how all of you are following
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두가 어떻게 따르고 있는지 보아라

sentences.original_text: the stubbornness of your evil hearts
